questions.question_text: Client access is the right to use for a specific amount of time.

discussion.content: B is the right answer

B- In Software Asset Management, client access generally refers to the right for a client (such as a user or device) to access and use specific software. It does not inherently imply a specific time limit; rather, it is usually tied to the terms of the software license, which could be perpetual, subscription-based, or otherwise defined by the license agreement. The right to use for a specific amount of time would typically be described as a subscription or term license, not client acces

Selected Answer: B
Software subscription: rights to use software for a specific amount of time. Who’s using a subscription software and the last time there was activity.

Selected Answer: B
SAM Professional Fundamentals course, Practical Management, Practical Management Overview, Common Terms: Client Access is a software license measured by the number of users or devices that can access a product.
B is correct
B, Subscription is the definition
it's false

Selected Answer: B
Coalesce can be applied on multiple fields

Selected Answer: B
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/tokyo-platform-administration/page/administer/import-sets/concept/c_ImportSetCoalesce.html

Multiple-field coalesce
You can coalesce on multiple fields to update an existing record.

If a target table record exists with the same values in all coalesce fields as the staging table record, the target table record is updated using the staging table record values. All coalesce field values between the target and staging tables must match to coalesce with multiple fields.
How is it possible to have so many wrong answers flagged as correct.

Selected Answer: B
There is a question later talking about coalescing on multiple fields.

Most of the answers on this study guide are WRONG. Make sure you read the discussions, where documentation is normally provided.

questions.question_text: Coalesce can only use a single field to uniquely identify a record.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Receive purchase orders: When receiving software entitlements, the asset tag, serial number, and license keys can be updated directly from the receiving popup.

Asset Tag is a required field. If the organization does not have asset tag software, consider having the purchasing product automatically generate a unique asset tag number.

Selected Answer: C
Right answer is C, based on servicenow SAM Fundamentals Course on operation integration module

questions.question_text: When receiving an order, which data point is mandatory?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
SAM Professional requires a separate subscription and must be activated by ServiceNow personnel. 

quote for quote from the fundamentals training

A&D
Servicenow SAM Kurs Lab:
"Software Asset Management related plugins vary in how they can be verified. Plugins that can be activated by the ServiceNow administrator can easily be verified as they display as Active in the plugins list. Plugins activated by ServiceNow need to be verified through alternate steps."

Selected Answer: D
From SAM Product Overview (SAM Plugins) module in SAM Fundamentals:

To utilize SAM these plugins are available for activation:

Activate all Software Asset Management Professional plugins including Software Asset Workspace*
Software Asset Management Professional for Microsoft*
Software Asset Management Professional for Oracle*
Software Asset Management Professional for VMware*
Software Asset Management Professional for IBM*
Software Asset Management Professional for Citrix*
Software Asset Management Professional for Adobe*
Software Asset Management Professional for SAP*
Service Graph Connector for Microsoft SCCM*
Normalization Data Services Client
Normalization Data Services Configuration
Performance Analytics for Software Asset Management 

All plugins identified above must be activated by ServiceNow.

if you look at the latest documenation for Vancouver, It says:
To purchase a subscription or load demo data after activation, contact your ServiceNow account manager. Within a few days, the account manager can activate the plugin and load any demo data on the production and non-production instances of your organization.
If you do not have an account manager, decide to delay activation until after your purchase, or want to evaluate the product on a non-production instance at no extra charge, you can use this procedure to submit a plugin activation request through the ServiceNow® Now Support Service Portal. 
Therefore D
Activate all Software Asset Management Professional plugins including Software Asset Workspace - Role Required: Admin. This is from servicenow docs. A is the right answer.

Selected Answer: D
This is the official "SAM Professional requires a separate subscription and must be activated by ServiceNow personnel."

SAM Plugins 
Plugins are software components that provide specific features and functionalities. Plugins may be enabled in one of the following ways: 
1. Activated by default in the base ServiceNow system. 
2. Activated by an admin user (not by default) through the ServiceNow Plugin list. 
3. Requested from ServiceNow (for plugins with additional licensing requirements). 

so the correct answer is A, E

Selected Answer: D
In the course it literally says: "All plugins identified above must be activated by ServiceNow".
This is in Utah

Selected Answer: A
The plugin must be activate in the STORE by an admin, so the answer D is incorrect.
it's D

comments.content: In the course said the plugin can be activate in the Servicenow STORE, and not support...
Where did you find that exactly?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
view on course

choices.B: They are activated by the sam_developer user
choices.D: They are requested from and activated by ServiceNow support
choices.C: They are activated by the sam_admin user
choices.E: They are activated by default in the base ServiceNow system
choices.A: They are requested from and activated by an admin user

questions.question_text: How are the Software Asset Management Professional Plugins activated?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BCE
"reclamation rule" is not necessary to import data

Selected Answer: BEF
A software product must have a product process, which consists of a filename, that is required for SCCM Usage to pull data. When adding a software product to a reclamation rule, any product processes associated with the software product are shown in the Product Process related list. Product processes are stored in the Software Product Process [samp_sw_product_process] table.

Selected Answer: BEF
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/utah-it-asset-management/page/product/software-asset-management2/task/create-reclamation-rule-sccm.html

"A software product must have a product process, which consists of a filename, that is required for SCCM Usage to pull data. When adding a software product to a reclamation rule, any product processes associated with the software product are shown in the Product Process related list. Product processes are stored in the Software Product Process [samp_sw_product_process] table."

Product processes are stored in the Software Product Process [samp_sw_product_process] table."
